channel.title: Me on Avolicious
channel.description: Recent content in Me on Avolicious

item.title: My First Blog Post
item.description:
Hey folks, I would like to start an experiment. This blog aka my new project is about improving my technical writing skills and should be used as a time capsule. During my time as software developer, system administrator and whatsoever I’ve been confronted with difficulty and different problems, so this blog should keep track of what I did and more preferably why.

What will this blog be mainly about?

The goal is to showcase some interesting problems I’ve faced and write down how I solved this problem.
